name: Cherry On The Top
description:
Cherry on the Top…

Cherry on the Top is a Puzzle game Where You have to Collect Three Cherry Which on The Platforms and with Many of Obstacle There are Only 10 Levels but he Very Difficult at The End and Few Of People Who Have IQ of 200 They Can be may Win The Game….

-Left Key <- OR A for Left Direction 

-Right Key -> OR D for Right Direction

-Space Bar for Jump Direction

It is Very Hard to Controls Can you beat it Like a Pro Gamer
